readPayPalCertFile

public static java.lang.String[] readPayPalCertFile(java.lang.String filename)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
Reads the user's PayPal-packaged PEM format public certificate and private key and parses into two strings.

Parameters:
filename - path to the PEM file
Returns:
array of two strings: array[0] is the public cert, and array[1] is the private key
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getUserCertFromString

public static java.security.cert.X509Certificate getUserCertFromString(java.lang.String certPEM)
                                                                throws TransactionException
Reads the user certificate and public key from a string

Parameters:
certPEM - PEM-encoded public certificate
Throws:
TransactionException - if there is a problem with the certificate
